title: (a) Star Wars comic book font - hand lettered {Yves}
content:
Greetings, I am new on the forum and I am looking for this source since days ago. It is from a Star Wars comic “Jedi Quest” published by the editorial Dark Horse Comics in 2001, although they have also used the same font in many other series. I have looked and looked at hundreds of sources, but I do not find any similar. I would be very very grateful for your help.

[http://img278.imageshack.us/img278/4827/starwarsjediquest02243fz.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102153956/http:/img278.imageshack.us/img278/4827/starwarsjediquest02243fz.jpg "http://img278.imageshack.us/img278/4827/starwarsjediquest02243fz.jpg")

 [‹ (x) IKKS / Reset Outerwear - Clarendon Ext / Lucida Sans, MS Trebuchet {George, Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102153956/http:/typophile.com/node/14926 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for typefaces similar to the Allianz logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102153956/http:/typophile.com/node/14923 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Pepuy

comments.content: This one looks hand lettered, but you can find similar comic book fonts at Blambot and Comicraft.
I had read that Dark Horse had used fonts from those two webs in their comics, but I have been searching there but I haven’t been able to find that specific font :-(
Because this one is hand lettered — check for example the different A’s.
